name: Swift Aid

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: As a swift action, you can attempt the aid another action, granting your ally either a +1 bonus on his next attack roll or a +1 bonus to his AC.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Aid another is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

description: With a quick but harmless swipe, you can aid an ally's assault.
